title: Loot Chest bugg
body:
Hi, 

For over a month now i haven't been getting any loot chest. 
I collected like 5 keys while waiting for chests. 
And i am not that terrible that i didn't get any s or higher whole last man. 
I would like to see the bugg fixed. 

Greetz,

replies.body: At a glance, it looks like you've been playing the same champions over and over recently. Nothing wrong with having a main, but keep in mind that you can only earn 1 chest per champion per season. Looks like you've already gotten chests for the champions you've been playing so you'll need to play someone else to get more chests for free.
